snippet: Shares of King Digital, maker of Candy Crush Saga, jumped after the company agreed to be acquired by Activision Blizzard.
abstract: Stock market ends higher for second straight day, helped by rally in energy companies.
lead_paragraph: Shares of King Digital, maker of Candy Crush Saga, jumped after the company agreed to be acquired by Activision Blizzard.

headline.main: Energy Companies Rally on Jump in Oil Prices, Lifting the Market
headline.print_headline: Energy Companies Rally on a Jump in the Oil Price, Lifting the Market
